Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player contains all method that allows player to play a match

      Indicates the player's available moves of Mother Nature, it's set when a player play an assistant card

      private int influencePoint

      private int lastPlayedAC
      It is the last assistant card that players played.

    • teacherAssignerModifier

      private boolean teacherAssignerModifier
      Boolean flag that it uses when the player play the special card that change the assignment of the teacher. It is set to false by default, and it is changed when the player play that special card.

    • assistantCardsPlayed

      private final ArrayList<Integer> assistantCardsPlayed
      Contains all the assistant card order tha player played.

    • checkCardAvailability

      public boolean checkCardAvailability(int cardOrder)
      checks if the card it's been already played and if it is the last card of the deck
      Parameters:
      cardOrder - indicate the order of the card
      Returns:
      true if the card is playable or false if is not playable

    • deckSize

      public boolean deckSize()
      Returns:
      true if there aren't cards in the deck

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public boolean moveStudentToIsland(int studentIndex, int islandIndex, Game game)
      The player choose based on the position of the student from the DashboardHall which one to move to the selected Island
      Parameters:
      islandIndex - indicate the index of island where we want to move the student
      studentIndex - indicate the position of the student in the DashboardHall
      game - is the game the player is playing.
      Returns:
      result of the action, true if succeeded, fast if failed catch a new Exception when the player select a null position or an invalid island's index

    • moveStudentToClassroom

      public boolean moveStudentToClassroom(int position, Game game)
      The player choose based on the position of the student from the DashboardHall which one to move to the classroom
      Parameters:
      position - indicate the position of the student in the DashboardHall
      Returns:
      result of the action, true if succeeded, fast if failed
